mapper.select: select p_no as pNo, owner_no as ownerNo, p_name as pName, p_price as pPrice, p_img as pImg from market_product where p_no between #{start} and #{end}
select p_no as pNo, owner_no as ownerNo, p_name as pName, p_price as pPrice, p_content as pContent, p_img as pImg, store_no as storeNo from market_product where store_no= #{storeNo}
